title: Portugal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Establish a trade route with another player.
- Learn the roles of all players you have active trade routes with. (Costs 4 Gold, +1 for each active trade route)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Trade routes generate 2 gold each night with a Good faction and 1 gold each night with any other faction.
- Trade routes last until your target visits you or your target dies. You will still get the income for that night.
- Trade routes do not generate gold the night they are established.
- You can have as many trade routes active as the night number divided by two, rounded up.
- Passively generate 2 gold each night.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were plundered by a Portuguese Nau.” (Factional Kill)
“Your trade route with ___ was destroyed!” (Trade route destroyed)
